data.message: Facebook: I have reached out via messenger and the help center to contact you regarding money I have raised through a fundraiser. I have yet to receive any of the money and have not received a message back from Facebook regarding this matter. What is going on!? I have been trying to get this matter resolved for over a week now. Case #10209858109225691 😡😡

replies.message: Hi Prince. You should receive payment 6 days after the donation is received. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2wB7JcB. -Ashley
